entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm.
